News.Title: Cubex Tubings Reports 74.34 Lakh Profit in Q2 FY2026 vs 174.34 Lakh Loss in Previous Quarter
News.Summary: Cubex Tubings Limited posted a profit of 74.34 lakh for the quarter ended September 30, 2025, marking a turnaround from the previous quarter's loss of 174.34 lakh. The copper and copper alloys manufacturer's half-year profit reached 297.40 lakh with total revenue from operations at 1,245.21 lakh for the six-month period.

News.Title: Cubex Tubings Reports 35% Jump in Quarterly Profit to ₹123.06 Lakhs
News.Summary: Cubex Tubings Limited reported a profit of ₹123.06 lakhs for the quarter ended June 30, 2025, compared to ₹91.00 lakhs in the same period last year. Net sales decreased to ₹4,987.21 lakhs from ₹5,492.73 lakhs year-over-year. The company's earnings per share improved to ₹0.86 from ₹0.64 in the corresponding quarter. Finance costs increased significantly to ₹92.85 lakhs from ₹48.98 lakhs. The company operates in a single segment of copper and copper alloy products. The board meeting was held on August 13, 2025, and the results were reviewed by the audit committee with a limited review report from statutory auditors.
